trend_definition.filter: airwatch.devicesensors.adp_modified_at WITHIN 60 days  AND  airwatch.devicesensors._ca_system_cpu_maxclockspeed <= 1024  AND  airwatch.devicesensors._ca_system_cpu_supported != 'Valid'  AND  airwatch.devicesensors._ca_system_logicalprocessors < 2
